reviews.review: I went into this movie not expecting it to be good, however, I was hoping that there might be something to like. I literally found nothing redeemable in this movie. I thought the story tried to convey a message that has been hundreds of times and has been absolutely executed much better in the past. The story is exceptionally boring and I found myself just waiting for the movie to end. It's repetitive and not one bit of it is compelling. I could not get emotionally invested in a feature on your phone. A majority of the characters are one-note (what do you expect from emojis anyway?!) and it makes it hard to truly empathize at any point. I also didn't find myself laughing even once during the entirety of this movie. Every joke is just a goofy pun and it gets old really fast. It was a movie that no one asked for and that no one should go see. It's not only the worst movie I've seen this year so far, it's the worst movie in a very long time. It's an unfunny, uncharismatic, and uninvolving animated feature that does not deserve your time or money.
Wow what is our world coming to

I knew this movie would be terrible ever since I saw the first teaser of this, a horrible plot and unfunny humor. The only good thing I liked about this movie was the animation, other then that it's just another cashgrab from Sony. I can't believe they cancelled the Popeye Animated movie over this. I DEFINITELY don't recommend wasting your time with this piece of garbage.

I couldn't rate 0 stars but this will have to do. This is going to be the worst movie ever. Who the heck thought it would be a good idea to cancel the Popeye movie, aka the thing people actually wanted to watch, for a stupid animated movie about emoticons. Who??
This trailer is absolute garbage. The humor is stupid and unfunny. I am almost certain that this will be a train wreck.

It was a really funny, super fast-paced and really entertaining animated family comedy adventure. It had really incredible animation, really superb voice cast, really great characters, really excellent humor, really fun adventure, really awesome visuals, really great music and a really original storyline. In my opinion, I think it's the best and funniest animated movie of the year in my whole life. I also would like to call it a masterpiece. I really recommend this movie to both kids and adults.
Come on Nintendo, first you won't put Halo on the switch and now you give us this!?
The film director probably has autism
Not as awful as I expected I guess
